gear.author: Poldrack Lab at Stanford University
gear.description: The package provides a series of image processing workflows to extract and compute a series of NR (no-reference), IQMs (image quality metrics) to be used in QAPs (quality assessment protocols) for MRI (magnetic resonance imaging). This tool extracts a series of IQMs from structural or functional MRI data. Note, this gear only supports the generation of individual scan reports; group reports are not generated.
gear.label: MRIQC: NR-IQMs for Functional MRI (mriqc v0.9.0-0)
gear.name: mriqc

invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for MRIQC: NR-IQMs for Functional MRI (mriqc v0.9.0-0)
